title: River of Dreams
description: A mysterious explosion in a backwater part of the galaxy sends a young Coalition officer and his alien partner Cham Tâ€™Baal on a covert mission to recover weapons secrets that could tip the scales of power on a interstellar level from falling into the wrong hands But that is the least of their troubles as they face political and personal turmoil, and Cham must face the mistakes of his past.
author: Dan R. Arman
